directives.report-uri: Deprecated. Specifies a URI to send CSP violation reports. Use report-to instead.
directives.navigate-to: Restricts the URLs to which a document can initiate navigation by any means.
directives.prefetch-src: Specifies valid sources for request prefetch and prerendering.
directives.webrtc: Defines whether WebRTC connections are allowed.

eval.wasmUnsafeEval: Using 'wasm-unsafe-eval' allows WebAssembly compilation from strings
eval.wasmUnsafeEvalRec: Only use if WebAssembly is required and all sources are trusted
eval.missingFormAction: Missing 'form-action' directive allows form submissions to any URL
eval.missingFormActionRec: Add 'form-action' directive to restrict where forms can be submitted

directives.report-uri: Forældet. Angiver en URI til at sende CSP-overtrædelsesrapporter. Brug report-to i stedet.
directives.navigate-to: Begrænser de URL'er, som et dokument kan starte navigation til på nogen måde.
directives.prefetch-src: Angiver gyldige kilder til anmodningsprefetch og prærendering.

eval.wasmUnsafeEval: Brug af 'wasm-unsafe-eval' tillader WebAssembly-kompilering fra strenge
eval.wasmUnsafeEvalRec: Brug kun hvis WebAssembly er påkrævet og alle kilder er betroede
eval.missingFormAction: Manglende 'form-action' direktiv tillader formularindsendelser til enhver URL
eval.missingFormActionRec: Tilføj 'form-action' direktiv for at begrænse hvor formularer kan indsendes
